Class Text

java.lang.Object
  




public class Text
extends greenfoot.Actor

Displays text in world.

Version:
April 2, 2018
Author:
Maggie Lin

Constructor Summary
Text(int wave, int size, java.awt.Color fontColor, java.awt.Color backColor)
          Creates text to show the wave number.
Text(java.lang.String text, int size)
          Creates text with white letters and transparent background with Arial Bold font.
Text(java.lang.String text, int size, java.awt.Color fontColor, java.awt.Color backColor)
          Creates text with a specified color and specified background with Arial Bold font.

public Text(int wave,
            int size,
            java.awt.Color fontColor,
            java.awt.Color backColor)
Creates text to show the wave number.

Parameters:
wave - Wave number
size - Size of the font, must be greater than 0
fontColor - Color of the font
backColor - Color of the background of the text

text - text to display
size - size of text

Parameters:
text - Text to display
size - Size of text
